definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: a swinging, waving, wave-offering, offering;—abs. ´[[ת]] Is 30:32 +; cstr. [[תְּנוּפַת]] Is 19:16, Ex 35:22; pl. cstr. [[תְּנוּפׂת]] Nu 18:11; —
a swinging, brandishing, ´[[יַד י]] ´[[ת]] Is 19:16 the brandishing of´[[י]]'s hand (in hostility); ´[[מִלְהֲמוֹת ת]] Is 30:32 battles of brandishing (brandished weapons).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: waving, wave-offering, term. techn. in P (H), orig. of priest's share of sacrifice (cf. [[נוף]]

definitions.title: Hiph. 4
definitions.body: ), [[לְ ְנְתַתִּים]] ´[[יִשׂ]] ´[[לְכָּל־תְּנוּפׂת בְּנֵ]] Nu 18:11; oft. as 2nd acc. after [[הֵנִיף]] Ex 29:25 + 5 t.; even of Levites Nu 8:11, Nu 8:13, Nu 8:15, Nu 8:20 (on all v. [[נוף]]

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: offering, of gold and brass for tabern., Ex 35:22, Ex 38:24, Ex 38:29.—On ´[[ת]] v. Di:Lv 7, 30 Benz:Arch. 459 f. and esp. Now:Arch. ii. 239 f; also [[תְּרוּמָה]].
